name: ~Space Station Escape~
description:
This is the sequel to Space Station Savior (Space Station Savior by CoderTang (itch.io)), another game created by me. If you haven't played it yet, you might want to.

Story:

You have been captured by evil robots! Escape their clutches by getting to the 3 teleportation crystals! Will you be able to make it?

WASD to move.

Space to jump.

Mouse to look.

Get to the red crystal to beat the level!

Play in fullscreen

For the best experience, download to your PC.

Modifications:

  • 3 Levels
  • Acid Mechanic
